subject: Re: [junit] how JUNIT goes on
msgSnippet: ... There are great references online for this. Trying Google keywords JUnit guide or JUnit cook s tour . -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software
messageBody:
Abbas wrote:
> Hello All,
>
> I have written test cases in NUnit, but it seems to be easy as
> compaired to JUnit, may be i am wrong but i have good programming
> skills in java rather then C#.net.
>
> NUnit goes very simply but i am trying to learn and i have executed
> JUnit test cases in IDE intelliJ. When i complie i got sometime errors
> which i dont know...
>
> can anyone please tell me the class hirarchiy. how it goes and what are
> the core methods that have to override or should be use ... in writing
> test cases in Junit...

There are great references online for this. Trying Google keywords
"JUnit guide" or "JUnit cook's tour".
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
